Nerangs.ab: raϑβō bərəzatō ... sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raϑβō aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ xšnūman ān ī bēd dō bār guftan ka ahlawān bēd aṣ̌aiia daδąmi auuaŋhā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō tā ō ī yasnąsca vaɱąsca aṣ̌aiia daδąmi arəzahibiiō ... aṣ̌aiia.nō paitī.jamiiāt̰ ka yazišn gāhānbār bēd ā̊ŋhąm asaŋhąmca tā ō ī aṣ̌aiia daδąmi raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiō.zarəmahe raθβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm haōmauuaitīm tā tauua ahurāne ahurahe xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe az aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm tā ēn gyāg dō bār guftan

"raϑβō bərəzatō ... sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raϑβō aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊. The should recite twice the corresponding šnūman. When it is the on for the ahlawān, (they should recite): aṣ̌aiia daδąmi auuaŋhā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō until yasnąsca vaɱąsca (They continue with) aṣ̌aiia daδąmi arəzahibiiō ... aṣ̌aiia.nō paitī.jamiiāt̰. When it is a liturgy for gāhānbār, (they recite) ā̊ŋhąm asaŋhąmca until aṣ̌aiia daδąmi raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiō.zarəmahe raθβō or the corresponding gāh aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm haōmauuaitīm until tauua ahurāne ahurahe xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. They should recite twice from aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm until this passage."

... sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raϑβō ka gāhānbār bēd ka-t aṣ̌ahe ratauuō guft maiδiiō.zarəmahe raθβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine ān ī bēd dō bār guftan ka yazišn gāhānbār bēd xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan agar yazišn srōš ud gāhānbār ud hōmyazd ud ohrmazd xwadāy bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ nē gōwišn abārīg gōwišn

"... sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanōiš raϑβō. When it is a gāhānbār, when you have said aṣ̌ahe ratauuō, (you continue with) maiδiiō.zarəmahe raθβō or the corresponding gāh aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine they should recite twice the corresponding (šnūman). When it is a liturgy for gāhānbār, they should recite twice xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmaiiehe raϑβō or the corresponding gāh aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe If the liturgy is for Srōš, Gāhānbār, Hōmyazd or the lord Ohrmazd, then they don' t have to recite auuaŋ́hā̊, but they have to recite the rest."
